subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kenneth Faried stayed hot with 16 points, and the United States rolled to a 4-0 start in the Basketball World Cup with a 106-71 victory over the Dominican Republic on Wednesday in Bilbao, Spain.
snippet: Kenneth Faried stayed hot with 16 points, and the United States rolled to a 4-0 start in the Basketball World Cup with a 106-71 victory over the Dominican Republic on Wednesday in Bilbao, Spain.
